import React from "react"; import { Box, Stack, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import HeroBannerImage from "../assets/images/pic1.jpg"; const HeroBanner = () => ( Fitness Club Sweat, Smile
And Repeat Check out the most effective exercises personalized to you Explore Exercises Exercise ); export default HeroBanner;
